title: Volkswagen Will Invest $193 Billion in Electric Cars and Software
description: The German automaker announced a plan to accelerate its transition to battery-powered vehicles and bolster operations in China and North America.

title: OpenAI Unveils GPT-4, Months After ChatGPT Stunned Silicon Valley
description: The company unveiled new technology called GPT-4 four months after its ChatGPT stunned Silicon Valley. The update is an improvement, but it carries some of the same baggage.

title: AI Funding Frenzy Escalates
description: In just weeks, a gold rush into artificial intelligence start-ups has become a full-blown mania.

title: 10 Ways GPT-4 Is Impressive but Still Flawed
description: OpenAI has upgraded the technology that powers its online chatbot in notable ways. It’s more accurate, but it still makes things up.

title: Meta to Lay Off Another 10,000 Workers
description: It would be the tech company’s second round of cuts since November. Mark Zuckerberg, its chief executive, has declared 2023 the “year of efficiency.”

title: Sabrina Brier Is TikTok’s Latest Character
description: Sabrina Brier is finding success online in the role of a 20-something in New York who’s trying to shed her basic suburban past.

title: Sabrina Brier Is TikTok’s Latest Character
description: Sabrina Brier is finding success online in the role of a 20-something in New York who’s trying to shed her basic suburban past.

title: After Bank Debacle, Silicon Valley Reckons With Its Image
description: Even as start-ups and investors began recovering their money from Silicon Valley Bank, the episode exposed the tech industry’s vulnerabilities.
